title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. H, art. 1, pt. 361 - Self-insurance Regulations
content:

State Regulations
§ 361.1 - Application
§ 361.2 - Agreement
§ 361.3 - Required deposit or surety
§ 361.4 - Periodic reports
§ 361.5 - Proof of ability to process claims
§ 361.6 - Obligations
§ 361.7 - Termination of self-insurer's status and withdrawal of security deposit
§ 361.8 - Revocation of self-insurance status; self-insurance deposit credit
§ 361.9 - Renumbered

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. H, art. 1, pt. 361

Statutory authority: Workers' Compensation Law, §§ 117, 141, 211, 241

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
